trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Bheir seo comas dhut dealbhan a thogail is a luchdadh suas.

trans-unit.source: Websites you visit may request your location.
trans-unit.target: Dh’fhaoidte gun iarr làraichean-lìn air an tadhal thu d’ ionad.

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.
trans-unit.target: Bheir seo comas dhut video a thogail is a luchdadh suas.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Bheir seo comas dhut dealbhan a shàbhaladh is a luchdadh suas.

trans-unit.note: Button on About screen

trans-unit.source: %@ is produced by Mozilla. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open Internet.
trans-unit.target: Chaidh %@ a chruthachadh le Mozilla. Tha e ’na amas dhuinn eadar-lìon fallainn is fosgailte a bhrosnachadh.
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Search and browse right in the app
trans-unit.target: Dèan lorg is brabhsadh san aplacaid fhèin
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block trackers (or update settings to allow trackers)
trans-unit.target: Bac tracaichean (no ùraich na roghainnean airson tracaichean a cheadachadh)
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Erase to delete cookies as well as search and browsing history
trans-unit.target: Dèan suathadh às airson an dà chuid briosgaidean agus eachdraidh nan lorg is a’ bhrabhsaidh a sguabadh às.
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Use it as a private browser:
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block Web fonts to reduce page size
trans-unit.target: Bac cruthan-clò lìn airson meud dhuilleagan a lùghdachadh
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Use it as a Safari extension:
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.target: Bu mhath le %@ aplacaid eile fhosgladh

Button label for opening another app from Focus
Button label in tel: dialog to call a phone number. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html
Button label in external link dialog to cancel the dialog. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html
Button label in mailto: dialog to send an email. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html

Dialog title used for Maps/App Store links. The placeholder is replaced with the application name, which can be either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html
Button label in App Store URL dialog to open the App Store. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html

trans-unit.source: %@ wants to open the App Store.
trans-unit.target: Bu mhath le %@ fhosgladh san App Store.
trans-unit.note: Dialog title used to open App Store links. The placeholder is replaced with the application name, which can be either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar.
Button label in Maps URL dialog to open Maps. Test page: https://people-mozilla.org/~bnicholson/test/schemes.html
Label on button to dismiss first run UI

trans-unit.source: Automatically block online trackers while you browse. Then tap to erase visited pages, searches, cookies and passwords from your device.
trans-unit.target: Bac tracaichean air loidhne gu fèin-obrachail nuair a nì thu brabhsadh. Thoir gnogag an uairsin airson na duilleagan air an do thadhail thu, na luirg a rinn thu, briosgaidean is faclan-faire a sguabadh às an uidheam agad.
trans-unit.note: Message label on the first run screen

trans-unit.target: Dèan brabhsadh mar nach eil duine am bith a’ cumail sùil ort.
trans-unit.note: Message label on the first run screen
Title for the loading screen when the handoff of clipboard delays Focus launch. “Handoff” should not be localized, see https://support.apple.com/HT204681
First label for product description on the home screen

trans-unit.target: Dèan brabhsadh. Dèan suathadh às. Agus a‑rithist.
trans-unit.note: Second label for product description on the home screen
Label in share alert to cancel the alert
Label in share alert to open the URL in Firefox
Label in share alert to open the full system share menu
Label in share alert to open the URL in Safari

trans-unit.source: Tap Safari, then select Content Blockers
trans-unit.target: Thoir gnogag air Safari agus tagh “Blocaichean susbaint”
trans-unit.note: Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings
Error label when the blocker is not enabled, shown in the intro and main app when disabled
Label for instructions to enable Safari, shown when enabling Safari Integration in Settings

trans-unit.source: Blocking other content trackers may break some videos and Web pages.
trans-unit.target: Ma bhacas tu tracaichean susbaint eile, dh’fhaoidte nach obraich cuid a dhuilleagan-lìn is videothan tuilleadh.
trans-unit.note: Alert message shown when toggling the Content blocker
Button label for declining Content blocker alert
Button label for accepting Content blocker alert

trans-unit.source: Mozilla strives to collect only what we need to provide and improve %@ for everyone.
trans-unit.target: Tha Mozilla an dealas dìreach an dàta a chruinneachadh a dh’fheumas sinn airson %@ a sholar is a leasachadh dhan a h-uile duine.
trans-unit.note: Description associated to the Send Usage Data toggle on main screen. %@ is the app name (Focus/Klar)
Subtitle for Send Anonymous Usage Data toggle on main screen
Title for settings screen
Title for the search engine row
Title for the search engine selection screen
Label for Safari integration section
Section label for Mozilla toggles
Section label for performance toggles
Section label for privacy toggles
Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.source: Some ads track site visits, even if you don’t click the ads
trans-unit.target: Tracaichidh cuid dhen t-sanasachd tadhlan air an làrach, fiù mur am briog thu orra
trans-unit.note: Description for 'Block ad Trackers'
Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.source: Used to collect, analyze and measure activities like tapping and scrolling
trans-unit.target: Thèid seo a chleachdadh airson gnìomhan mar ghnogadh is sgroladh a chruinneachadh, a sgrùdadh is a thomhas
trans-unit.note: Description for 'Block analytics Trackers'
Label for toggle on main screen
Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.source: Enabling may cause some pages to behave unexpectedly
trans-unit.target: Ma chuireas tu seo an comas, dh’fhaoidte nach obraich cuid a dhuilleagan buileach mar bu chòir
trans-unit.note: Description for 'Block other content Trackers'
Label for toggle on main screen

trans-unit.source: Embedded on sites to track your visits and to display functionality like share buttons
trans-unit.target: Thèid seo a leabachadh air làraichean airson tracadh a dhèanamh ort ma thadhlas tu air làrach agus airson rudan mar phutanan co-roinnidh a shealltainn dhut
trans-unit.note: Description for 'Block social Trackers'

trans-unit.source: May break some videos and Web pages
trans-unit.target: Dh’fhaoidte nach obraich cuid a dhuilleagan-lìn is videothan tuilleadh
trans-unit.note: Label subtitle for toggle on main screen
Safari toggle label on settings screen
Label for Send Usage Data toggle on main screen

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Firefox but doesn’t have it installed. This string will not wrap in the interface. Instead, it will truncate. To prevent this, please keep the localized string to 18 or fewer characters. If your string runs longer than 18 characters, you can use 'Get Firefox' as the basis for your string. However, if at all possible, we’d like to signal to the user that they will be going to the App Store and installing the application from there. That is why we are using Get and App in the en-US string.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Focus.
Label for cancel button shown when entering a URL or search
Text for the URL context menu when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.
Erase button in the URL bar

trans-unit.source: Your browsing history has been erased.
trans-unit.target: Chaidh an eachdraidh brabhsaidh agad a sguabadh às.
trans-unit.note: Message shown after pressing the Erase button
Placeholder text shown in the URL bar before the user navigates to a page
Label displayed for search button when typing in the URL bar
Text for the URL bar showing the number of trackers blocked on a webpage.
Title for action sheet item to open the current page in another application. Placeholder is the name of the application to open the current page.
Label to display in the Discoverability overlay for keyboard shortcuts
Text for the context menu when a user has a link on their clipboard.
Text for the context menu when a user wants to copy an image after long pressing it.
Text for the context menu when a user wants to copy a link after long pressing it.
Text for the context menu when a user wants to save an image after long pressing it.
Text for the context menu when a user wants to share a link after long pressing it.
Dialog title used for opening an external app from Focus. First placeholder string is the app name of either Focus or Klar and the second placeholder string specifies the app it wants to open.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save images to your Camera Roll
trans-unit.target: Bheir seo comas dhut an dealbh a shàbhaladh ann an albam a’ chamara agad
trans-unit.note: Description for dialog used for requesting a user to enable access to Photos.
Title for button that takes the user to system settings

trans-unit.source: “%@” Would Like to Access Your Photos
trans-unit.target: Bu mhath le “%@” cothrom air na dealbhan agad
trans-unit.note: Dialog title used for requesting a user to enable access to Photos. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar
Label for ad trackers.
label for analytic trackers.
label for content trackers.

trans-unit.target: Tha an dìon o thracadh dheth
trans-unit.note: text showing the tracking protection is disabled.
label for social trackers.

trans-unit.source: Disable until you close %@ or tap ERASE.
trans-unit.target: Cuir à comas gus an dùin thu %@ no gus an doir thu gnogag air “SUATH ÀS”.
trans-unit.note: Description for the tracking protection toggle. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar
Text for the toggle that temporarily disables tracking protection.

trans-unit.source: Choose whether %@ blocks ad, analytic, social, and other trackers.
trans-unit.target: Cuir romhad am bac %@ tracaichean sanasachd is sgrùdaidh, tracaichean sòisealta is feadhainn eile.
trans-unit.note: General description of tracking protection settings, which is displayed underneath the trackers preferences in Settings. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar
